definition: one's office/place where one holds a post
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
to attend/to take office/to be present (in administrative capacity)
to retire from a government post (old)
local magistrate
(literary) to be in mourning after the death of a parent
to dismiss from office/to resign from office
provincial governor (old)
to respond to an imperial decree
to receive an imperial command
the death of one's mother
to pull out/to select/to promote
senior provincial government official in dynastic China

to die of an illness
to resign a government post
governor of a province
to migrate/to move house
